text:
@globaltimesnews Anyone else think these are crazy coincidences of Coronavirus!

- started in Wuhan. Lab there has logo matching bio weapon lab Umbrella Corp in Resident Evil 2 game. 
- RE2 is staged in Raccoon City. Corona scrambled
- CDC director is named Redfield; same as main character in RE2
